text: Eghtɨ gumazamiziba ia mɨkɨmtɨ, ia mangɨ gumazamizir oveaghuezibar duaba ko mɨkɨm, me da nɨghnɨziba iniam. Egha me kuarazibar mɨn imoba, sighsirir akabar mɨgei. Ezɨ gumazamizir oveaghueziba, me nɨghnɨziba gumazamizir angamɨra itibar anɨngan iburagham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, e tizim bagh aseba ko gumazamizir oveaghueziba da nɨghnɨziba iniasa ivemara me bagha zui? Puvatɨ. Arazir kam ikufi. Me uan God bagh mangɨ.
